channel.description: Recent content in poppendieck on Mark Needham

item.title: Lean Software Development: Book Review
item.description: Lean Software Developmentby Mary and Tom Poppendieck I’m keen to learn how the ideas from The Toyota Waycan be applied to software development and as far as I know this is the first book which addressed this, hence the reason for me reading it. I am keen to see how the authors suggest introducing some of these ideas in Implementing Lean Software Development.
